name: Loyalty and Blood: Viktor Origins
description: Years after leaving to wander Overworld, Viktor returns home to find his mother long dead and his brother in command of the Legion. As he aims to pick up the pieces of the life he left behind, Viktor finds himself in the midst of a gathering storm that will change Overworld forever...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 1.7 GHz Processor Graphics: Nvidia or AMD graphics card with updated drivers, 256 MB Storage: 350 MB available space Additional Notes: Mouse and keyboard or Xbox 360 controller
